--- 
37-year-old Oksana has been paralysed since childhood and moves only with the help of a wheelchair. Due to her health limitations, Oksana relies on the assistance of others. Her retired parents provide all the necessary care but are running out of strength. Thanks to the services of the home care centre opened in Moldova by Caritas Czech Republic in Moldova, financed by the @Czech Development Agency, they are not alone. 
 
Find out more about our medical outreach in Moldova. üëâ https://bit.ly/medical_care_moldovame

52let√° Elham ≈æila a≈æ do invaze samozvan√©ho Isl√°msk√©ho st√°tu v k≈ôes≈•ansk√© oblasti pobl√≠≈æ Mosulu. S man≈æelem a t≈ôemi dƒõtmi se pak museli dvakr√°t stƒõhovat, nakonec na≈°li √∫toƒçi≈°tƒõ ve ≈†v√©dsku. Po n√°vratu do Ir√°ku zjistili, ≈æe jim Isl√°msk√Ω st√°t vyp√°lil jejich domov. Elhamin man≈æel mƒõl pot√≠≈æe sehnat pr√°ci, a tak se Elham rozhodla otev≈ô√≠t si vlastn√≠ obchod, aby mohla podporovat svou rodinu.  
 
Charita ƒåesk√° republika j√≠ poskytla pomocnou ruku ‚Äì nab√≠dli jsme j√≠ mo≈ænost absolvovat ≈°kolen√≠ podnikatelsk√Ωch dovednost√≠, po kter√©m Elham z√≠skala grant na zalo≈æen√≠ ≈æivnosti. D√≠ky t√©to podpo≈ôe mohla po≈ô√≠dit pro sv≈Øj obchod pot≈ôebn√© vybaven√≠ a zbo≈æ√≠. Dnes Elham √∫spƒõ≈°nƒõ podnik√°. üëè 
 
P≈ôeƒçtƒõte si v√≠ce o Elham a dal≈°√≠ch ≈æen√°ch, kter√Ωm jsme pomohli postavit se na vlastn√≠ nohy. üëâ 
http://bit.ly/48KD5zv 
--- 
Meet Elham, a courageous Iraqi woman who overcame many obstacles and started her own business thanks to our support. üåü 
 
Elham, 52, lived in a Christian area near Mosul until the invasion of the self-proclaimed Islamic State. She, her husband and three children then had to move twice, eventually finding refuge in Sweden. 
On their return to Iraq, they found that the Islamic State had burned down their home. Elham's husband had difficulty finding work, so Elham decided to open her own business to support her family.   
  
Caritas Czech Republic in Iraq offered her a helping hand - we gave her the opportunity to receive business skills training, after which Elham received a grant to set up her business. Thanks to this support, Elham was able to purchase the necessary equipment and goods for her shop. Today, Elham has a successful business. üëè  
  
Read more about Elham and other women we helped get on their own feet. üëâ 
 http://bit.ly/4aMm

Seznamte se s Munou, jednou z mnoha ir√°ck√Ωch ≈æen, kter√© sn√≠ o vlastn√≠m podnik√°n√≠. Muna od dƒõtstv√≠ tou≈æila m√≠t jednou sv≈Øj vlastn√≠ salon. Podnik√°n√≠ je ov≈°em pro ≈æeny v Ir√°ku ƒçasto tƒõ≈æko splniteln√Ω sen. Ve chv√≠li, kdy ale man≈æel Muny nedok√°zal u≈æivit rodinu, souhlasil, aby si jeho man≈æelka vlastn√≠ salon otev≈ôela. To se j√≠ s na≈°√≠ pomoc√≠ poda≈ôilo.  

‚ÄûD√≠ky Charitƒõ jsem se z√∫ƒçastnila desetidenn√≠ho ≈°kolen√≠ podnikatelsk√Ωch dovednost√≠ a z√≠skala jsem grant, kter√Ω mi pomohl rozjet m≈Øj salon,‚Äú vypr√°v√≠ Muna. Za pen√≠ze nakoupila pot≈ôebn√© vybaven√≠. Dnes Muna nab√≠z√≠ celou ≈ôadu slu≈æeb a m√° mnoho n√°pad≈Ø, jak svou ≈æivnost je≈°tƒõ v√≠ce rozvinout. D√≠ky podpo≈ôe Charita ƒåesk√° republika zamƒõstnala Muna dvƒõ dal≈°√≠ ≈æeny, z nich≈æ jedna je vdova, kter√° ≈æiv√≠ sv√Ωch deset sourozenc≈Ø. 

P≈ôeƒçtƒõte si o dal≈°√≠ch inspirativn√≠ch ≈æen√°ch podnikatelk√°ch: üëâ https://bit.ly/irak_podnikani 

--- 

Meet Muna, one of the many Iraqi women who dream of owning their own business. Ever since she was a child, Muna had planned to open a salon one day. However, entrepreneurship is often a difficult to achieve dream for women in Iraq. But when Muna's husband was unable to support his family, he agreed to let his wife open her own salon, which she did with our help.   

"Thanks to Caritas, I attended a ten-day business skills training and received a grant that helped me start my salon," says Muna. With the money, she bought the necessary items for her business. Today, Muna offers a range of services and has many ideas on how to grow her business even further. Thanks to the support of Caritas Czech Republic in Iraq, Muna has employed two other women, one of whom is a widow supporting her ten siblings.  

Read about other inspiring women entrepreneurs: üëâ https://bit.ly/iraq_entrepreneurs

ad_creative_bodies:
Tragick√° v√°lka mezi Izraelem a Ham√°sem katastroficky dopad√° p≈ôedev≈°√≠m na civiln√≠ obyvatelstvo P√°sma Gazy.  üíî

Na 85 % v≈°ech tamn√≠ch obyvatel muselo opustit svoje domovy a t√≠sn√≠ se v nelidsk√Ωch podm√≠nk√°ch v n√°hradn√≠ch p≈ô√≠st≈ôe≈°c√≠ch ƒçi improvizovan√Ωch stanov√Ωch t√°borech. V nich ov≈°em chyb√≠ jak√°koliv infrastruktura vƒçetnƒõ zdroj≈Ø vody ƒçi sanit√°rn√≠ho za≈ô√≠zen√≠. V Gaze je katastrof√°ln√≠ nedostatek pitn√© vody, j√≠dla, l√©k≈Ø i z√°kladn√≠ hygieny. ≈Ω√°dn√© m√≠sto nav√≠c nen√≠ bezpeƒçn√©. 

Charita pom√°h√° p≈ô√≠mo na m√≠stƒõ. Pomoci m≈Ø≈æete i vy! üëâ https://bit.ly/3QzOgot
---
The tragic war between Israel and Hamas is having a catastrophic impact on the civilian population of the Gaza Strip in particular.  üíî

Some 85% of all its residents have been forced to flee their homes and are crowded in inhumane conditions in shelters or improvised tent camps. However, they lack any infrastructure, including water sources or sanitation facilities. There is a catastrophic shortage of drinking water, food, medicine and basic sanitation in Gaza. Moreover, no place is safe. 

Caritas is helping on the ground. You can help, too!  üëâ https://bit.ly/gaza_appeal_caritas

ad_creative_bodies:
Ozbrojen√Ω konflikt mezi Ham√°sem a Izraelem si zat√≠m jen v Gaze vy≈æ√°dal p≈ôes 23 000 mrtv√Ωch a tak≈ôka 60 000 zranƒõn√Ωch. Nucenƒõ vys√≠dlen√Ωch je 1,9 milionu obyvatel, co≈æ je v√≠ce ne≈æ 85 % populace, a v Gaze se tak odehr√°v√° bezprecedentn√≠ humanit√°rn√≠ katastrofa.

V oblasti se nedost√°v√° ani tƒõch nejz√°kladnƒõj≈°√≠ch pot≈ôeb, jako jsou pitn√° voda, j√≠dlo ƒçi zdravotn√≠ p√©ƒçe. 

Na pomoci civilist≈Øm v Gaze √∫zce spolupracujeme s na≈°√≠ partnerskou organizac√≠ Charitou Jeruzal√©m, kter√° dlouhodobƒõ pom√°h√° zaji≈°≈•ovat z√°kladn√≠ pot≈ôeby tamn√≠ch obyvatel a je i nad√°le odhodl√°na slou≈æit lidem v≈°ech vyzn√°n√≠. üôè

Dƒõkujeme, ≈æe n√°m pom√°h√°te pom√°hat: üëâ https://bit.ly/3QzOgot

---
The armed conflict between Hamas and Israel has so far resulted in over 23,000 dead and close to 60,000 wounded in Gaza alone. There are 1.9 million internally displaced people, more than 85% of the population, and Gaza is facing an unprecedented humanitarian disaster.

Even the most basic needs, such as drinking water, food and health care, are scarce in the area. 

We have been working closely with our partner organisation, Caritas Jerusalem, on securing aid for the civilian population in Gaza. Caritas Jerusalem has been providing the basic needs of the people in Gaza for a long time and remains committed to serving people of all faiths. üôè 

Thank you for helping us help:  üëâ https://bit.ly/gaza_appeal_caritas

--- 
Meet Elham, a courageous Iraqi woman who overcame many obstacles and started her own business thanks to our support. üåü 
 
Elham, 52, lived in a Christian area near Mosul until the invasion of the self-proclaimed Islamic State. She, her husband and three children then had to move twice, eventually finding refuge in Sweden. 
On their return to Iraq, they found that the Islamic State had burned down their home. Elham's husband had difficulty finding work, so Elham decided to open her own business to support her family.   
  
Caritas Czech Republic in Iraq offered her a helping hand - we gave her the opportunity to receive business skills training, after which Elham received a grant to set up her business. Thanks to this support, Elham was able to purchase the necessary equipment and goods for her shop. Today, Elham has a successful business. üëè  
  
Read more about Elham and other women we helped get on their own feet. üëâ 
 http://bit.ly/4aMm

Charita pom√°h√° p≈ô√≠mo na m√≠stƒõ. Pomoci m≈Ø≈æete i vy! üëâ https://bit.ly/3QzOgot

The tragic war between Israel and Hamas is having a catastrophic impact on the civilian population of the Gaza Strip in particular.  üíî

Some 85% of all its residents have been forced to flee their homes and are crowded in inhumane conditions in shelters or improvised tent camps. However, they lack any infrastructure, including water sources or sanitation facilities. There is a catastrophic shortage of drinking water, food, medicine and basic sanitation in Gaza. Moreover, no place is safe. 

Caritas is helping on the ground. You can help, too!  üëâ https://bit.ly/gaza_appeal_caritas
